items.content_html: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view to eliminating or ameliorating the "microservices premium" - the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.
items.title: module-federation/MicroLib: MicroLib is a lightweight API framework built on Node.js that uses module federation to host and integrate multiple, independently deployable "microservice libraries" running in the same process, with a view to eliminating or ameliorating  the "microservices premium" - the trade-off between deployment independence and operational complexity.
